1.0.name: wordpress/rss-defender
1.0.description:
Easy Twitter Plugin allows you to add the Twitter Follow Button in just a few seconds.

This Twitter Plugin easy to create twitter feed in your blog for settings Twitter API support display user timeline a collection recent Tweets posted by the user indicated by the screen_name or user_id parameters. Each user timeline protected, user will authenticated for use twitter api approved follower of the timeline.

This new Twitter Plugin lets you display your latest twitter status updates and a Twitter Button in any of the widgetized areas. Just add the Twitter Plugin to your sidebar or any of the Twitter Plugin areas and enter your twitter username. It will display your latest tweets along with a follow @username Button and a simple Twitter Button to make it easier for people to follow you! You can configure widget title, Twitter Button Format, Twitter Username, number of Tweets to display in your Twitter Button, Link target etc, in the widget configuration. Features: Optio
